actions.name: Unleafed
actions.description:
Trigger: The user gains this Ability.

Effect: The user gains +1 ATK, DEF, SPATK, SPDEF, SPD, ACC, and EVA for X Activations, where X is equal to 3 + the number of @Affliction[fainted] allies on the user's own team (max 9).

system.description:
